experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: I have developed complex, reusable Vue.js components with Pinia for state management, optimized performance and scalability by refactoring legacy code, and collaborated with UX/UI designers and backend developers for seamless feature integration. I also used WebSocket for real-time data display and Chart.js for intuitive data visualizations.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: During my role, I led the development of new features and functionalities from concept to production. I specialized in building single-page applications using Vue.js, Vuex, CSS (Sass), and Django, focusing on delivering seamless user experiences. I also improved code quality by expanding test coverage with Jest for unit testing and utilizing Cypress for end-to-end testing, ensuring reliable software delivery.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: In a small team setting, I developed websites and applications using React, TypeScript, and Node.js, covering both client-side and server-side tasks. I focused on implementing API services with database integration using Node.js Express and gained experience working with backend APIs.
